objective: User Sarah Chen in Building B can't print to the networked printer. She can connect to it but documents won't print. What's wrong?

problem_context.focus: Verify user-side configuration and printer queue status
questions: Is the printer set as the default and online in Sarah's system settings?
Are there any paused print jobs or errors visible in her local print queue?
Can another user in Building B successfully print to the same printer?

steps.description: Gather initial information about the issue
steps.findings: {'printer_name': 'networked printer in Building B', 'status': 'online', 'ip_address': '192.168.1.157', 'jobs_in_queue': 2, 'paper_level': '97%', 'toner_level': '97%', 'last_job': '5 minutes ago'}
{'user_id': 'default_user', 'resource': 'networked printer in Building B', 'has_access': False, 'permission_level': None, 'granted_by': None, 'expires': None}
